Steps in educating and facilitating people
It is important that the participants learn how to put all these learning methods together to educate and empower people in their community.  This unit will 
introduce step-by-step guidelines for doing so.
Preparation Before coming to the session, it is important to do the following:
✱  Finalizing the topics to be discussed, the target group and the objectives 
as well as getting related information to support the discussions must be 
organized beforehand.  For example, if the discussion would be about foods 
and exercise with adults, CHW and CV may need information about the proportion of adults in the community who are overweight, have diabetes, are hypertensive, etc. This information can be obtained from health staff at 
health centres.  It can draw people’s attention to what will be discussed with 
them.
